document.full_text: shares of acorda therapeutics inc jumped 27 percent before being halted amid optimism the company will be granted a patent extension on its multiple sclerosis drug ampyra.
document.title: acorda shares soar on possible patent extension of ms drug
lines_and_colors: shares of acorda therapeutics inc jumped 27 percent before being halted amid optimism the company will be granted a patent extension on its multiple sclerosis drug ampyra.
